lead_paragraph: The new Broadway musical “Spider-Man: Turn Off the Dark” sold more than $1 million in tickets within 24 hours after the show’s first preview on Sunday night.
snippet: The new Broadway musical “Spider-Man: Turn Off the Dark” sold more than $1 million in tickets within 24 hours after the show’s first preview on Sunday night.

headline.main: Producer Says ‘Spider-Man’ Has Strong Ticket Sales
headline.print_headline: Producer Says ‘Spider-Man’ Has Strong Ticket Sales

byline.original: By PATRICK HEALY; Compiled by DAVE ITZKOFF
